npm-scripts-explained.start: start the app with ts-node - this can be used to attach to a debugger
npm-scripts-explained.start:watch: re-start the app whenever code changes
npm-scripts-explained.test: test all files matching the pattern *.test.ts
npm-scripts-explained.test:watch: run the test command when anything within the /src folder changes
npm-scripts-explained.lint: lint all ts files in /src folder
npm-scripts-explained.lint:watch: run the lint command when anything within the /src folder changes
npm-scripts-explained.lint:fix: fix all linting issues in all files * use with caution *
npm-scripts-explained.build: transplile TS into es5 in the /dist folder
npm-scripts-explained.build:watch: run the build command when anything within the /src folder changes
npm-scripts-explained._delete-deps: Deletes node_modules folder, called at the monorepo level with clean
